meanings.definition: A disease affecting plants, characterized by swollen, deformed roots.
meanings.sent1: The farmer noticed the clubroots on his crops and knew he had to take action.
meanings.sent2: The garden was struggling due to the presence of clubroots in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits whispered to each other, 'Let's play a prank and give the carrots clubroots!'
meanings.sent4: The clubroots in the garden were like hidden traps waiting to trip up unsuspecting plants.
meanings.sent5: The clubroots seemed to strangle the life out of the once vibrant garden.
